column8: http://www.malaysiakini.com/news/380341Cops grill Pua over Najib video, seize mobile phoneLu Wei Hoong     28 April 2017The police spent 80 minutes recording a statement from DAP lawmaker Tony Pua on a video recording that allegedly contains defamatory remarks against Prime Minister Najib Abdul Razak.After being grilled at the Bukit Aman federal police headquarters, the Petaling Jaya Utara MP was taken out in a police vehicle, about 11.40am.For the rest of this story and more, subscribe for only RM150 a year (full news access)or RM420 a year (full news + full archive access).
